name: user-rights
description: This repo should contain two things. First, create a file that contains a list of user rights for the system.  It should be a map of rights constants to rights data structures that contain a name for the right and its bit flag. Second, write a function in Javascript that checks the supplied JWT against a supplied right to see if the user has that right.

scripts.test: hecks the supplied JWT against a supplied right to see if the user has that right.

author: hnl_team
